name: The Call (itch) (Jamwillinob)
description:
The Call is a short platformer about losing control of who you are to things we can't understand. Literally.

Use space to jump (or double-jump) and try your best to keep track of the changing keys and keep things under control.

Created in 2 weeks for #RainbowJam16 by James Noble, Grant Stranaghan, Rachel Simpson and Daryl Dundee.
